info.name: OBA APIs Integration
info.description: Complete API collection for testing the OBA APIs Integration WordPress plugin. This collection includes all authentication, user management, product, order, vendor, and membership endpoints.

request.description: Authenticate user with email and password. Returns access and refresh tokens.
Logout user and blacklist tokens.
Refresh access token using refresh token.
Request password reset for user account
Verify password reset token validity
Reset password using valid reset token
Get current authenticated user information.
Update user profile information including billing and shipping addresses.
Get personalized medication recommendations based on user's health conditions, allergies, and current medications.
Get personalized doctor recommendations based on user's location, specialty needs, and health conditions.

Generate a one-time access token with call_id that can be used for automatic login via URL. When user visits the site_url, they will be automatically logged in and redirected to dashboard with call_id parameter.
Get list of products with optional filters
Get single product details
Get list of product categories
Check if user needs to complete survey for product
Get list of user's orders
Get single order details
Create new order
Get list of vendors
Get single vendor details
Get list of products for specific vendor

item.name: Membership

request.description: Process complete membership signup with user creation, Stripe payment processing, and membership assignment. Supports custom fields, billing address, and payment method setup.
Get current user's membership status including level details, expiration, permissions, and group information
Get all available membership plans with detailed information including pricing, cycles, trials, groups, and features
Cancel current membership with options for immediate cancellation or end-of-period cancellation. Includes reason tracking and email notifications.
Upgrade or downgrade membership level with payment processing for paid upgrades. Supports billing address updates and payment method changes.
Get comprehensive user profile including membership details, billing address, custom fields, membership history, and recent orders
Update user profile information including personal details, billing address, and custom fields. All fields are optional and only provided fields will be updated.
Get checkout form fields and configuration for membership signup

item.description: Complete Paid Memberships Pro integration for mobile applications including checkout, signup, management, and profile operations

request.description: Get survey details including questions and answers
Submit survey answers with product ID
Re-suubmit survey answers with product ID
Get cart summary (item count and total quantity)
Add product to cart or update quantity if already exists. If 'purchase_type' is 'subscription', you can optionally send 'subscription_plan_id' (scheme key).
Remove product from cart using cart item ID
Update cart item quantity using cart item ID
Clear the entire cart
Retrieve checkout data including cart summary, addresses, available payment methods (COD, Stripe), and shipping methods from ShipStation/Dokan vendors.
Get available shipping rates for the given address. Updates both billing and shipping in WooCommerce session.
Select one or more shipping methods (by rate_id) for each vendor/package in the cart.
Validate checkout data before processing.
Process checkout, create order, and initiate payment. For Stripe, send the payment method ID obtained via Stripe SDK in `stripe_payment_method_id`.
Check if a coupon code is valid without applying it.
Apply a valid coupon code to the current cart.
Remove a coupon code from the current cart.

Create a new medical appointment.

Required Parameters:
- doctor_id: ID of the doctor
- clinic_id: ID of the clinic
- patient_id: ID of the patient
- appointment_date: Date of appointment (YYYY-MM-DD)
- appointment_time: Time of appointment (HH:MM)
- appointment_id: Unique appointment identifier
Get all appointments for the current user
Get details of a specific appointment by ID
Get details of a specific appointment by ID
Check if there's a pending call for the current user

Check the end status of a call for a specific appointment

Note: The 'appointment_id' parameter refers to the appointment ID

Update the call ID for a specific appointment

Note: The 'appointment_id' parameter refers to the appointment ID
Submit patient feedback for a specific appointment

Get all medication 
  requests pending->(pending approval - retake) 
 approved -> (approved - complete) 
 rejected -> (rejected)
Get all doctors rating
Get emergency clinics information
Get list of blog posts with pagination
Get specific blog post details
Get current user's credit balance
Add credits to user account
